name: Sweetheart
wishText: Added your name so you don't think i use this for my 'other  girls'! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!!  Many many happy blah...
text3: i already did that earlier today.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Happy Birthday to the sweetest, kindhearted and most loving person i know!, Thank you for coming into my life!
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
